CustomField.description: This formula field combines 'Owner_Role__c' values from the related Account
CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "SLED"), "PubSec", IF( CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "CA"), "Canada", IF( CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "COR"), IF(CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "US"), "Core", "Core - Canada"), IF( CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "SEL"), IF(CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "US"), "Select - US", IF(CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "EMEA"), "EMEA", "Select - Canada")), IF( CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "STR"), IF(CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "US"), "Strategic - US", IF(CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "EMEA"), "EMEA", "Strategic - Canada")), IF( CONTAINS(pse__Account__r.Owner_Role__c, "MM"), "Mid-Market", "" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is automatically populated based on the Project Account. This field cannot be edited. Please contact your system administrator with questions.
CustomField.label: Segment
